select u.UserCode,u.UserName,u.MoneyCard,
u.ARatio,
u.ARatio2 ARatio,
u.BRatio,
u.BRatio2 BRatio,
u.CRatio,
u.CRatio2 CRatio,
u.DRatio,
u.DRatio2 DRatio,
u.ERatio,
u.ERatio2 ERatio,
u.FRatio,
u.FRatio2 FRatio,
m.SerialNo,m.Year,m.Month,m.State,m.SavePath,m.FileName,m.Title,m.Content,m.ScoreStatus, s.StationName,s.StationCode,d.DepartmentCode,d.DepartmentName, r.RoleCode,r.RoleName from user u ,monthsummary m,station s,department d,role r,user_role ur
and u.UserName like concat('%',#{userDto.username},'%')
and u.dbbk in('3','4') and m.dbtype =#{userDto.dbtype}
and m.dbtype =#{userDto.dbtype}
and u.StationCode=#{userDto.stationcode}
and u.Roletype=#{userDto.roletype}
and m.Year=#{userDto.year}
and m.Month=#{userDto.month}
and m.State=#{userDto.state} and r.RoleCode !="150" and r.RoleCode !="600" and r.RoleCode !="700"
and (m.Title is null or m.Title='') and (m.Content is null or m.Content='') and r.RoleCode !="150" and r.RoleCode !="600" and r.RoleCode !="700"
and m.ScoreStatus=#{userDto.scorestatus}
and u.UserCode =m.EmployeeCode and u.RoleType="0" and u.Flag="0" and u.StationCode=s.StationCode and s.DepartmentCode=d.DepartmentCode and u.UserCode=ur.UserCode and r.RoleCode=ur.RoleCode
and r.RoleCode in
#{item}
order by m.Year+0 desc, m.Month+0 desc,m.Pubdate desc
